CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c , "Small - Simple"), IMAGE("https://i.imgur.com/ZCeyKjd.jpg",'',500, 800), IF(ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c , "Small - Complex"), IMAGE("https://i.imgur.com/hCmk3tl.jpg",'',500, 800), IF(ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c , "Emergent - Simple"), IMAGE("https://i.imgur.com/xu7sXnW.jpg",'',500, 800), IF(ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c , "Emergent - Complex"), IMAGE("https://i.imgur.com/LFUnMy2.jpg",'',500, 800), IF(ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c , "Advanced"), IMAGE("https://i.imgur.com/6DrICbc.jpg",'',500, 800), IF(ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c , "Enterprise"), IMAGE("https://i.imgur.com/u9rr7gL.jpg",'',500, 800), NULL))))))
CustomField.label: Segmentation Description
